Graphics::GraphicsManager

Graphics::GraphicsManager Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for Graphics::GraphicsManager:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Manages the communication with the Graphics engine (OGRE)


Public Member Functions

 GraphicsManager ()
 Constructor. Initializes class attributes.
 ~GraphicsManager ()
 Destructor. Class release.
bool init ()
 Initializes the class so it becomes valid.
void end ()
 Releases the class resources. After this method is called the class is not valid anymore.
void draw ()
 Renders everything in the scene.
bool hasVertexProgramsSupport () const
 Returns true if the system supports vertex programs (vertex shaders).
bool hasFragmentProgramsSupport () const
 Returns true if the system supports fragment programs (pixel shaders).
bool hasBumpMappingSupport () const
 Returns true if the system supports bump mapping. To support bump mapping the system need support of: vertex programs, and (fragment programs or dot3 texture in the fixed-function pipeline).

bool Graphics::GraphicsManager::hasBumpMappingSupport (  )  const

Returns true if the system supports bump mapping. To support bump mapping the system need support of: vertex programs, and (fragment programs or dot3 texture in the fixed-function pipeline).

For internal use only.

Returns:
true if the system supports bump mapping
